column1: Visitation with family and friends will be held on Sunday
column2: June 21st from 12:00 - 2:00pm at Nobles Funeral Chapel in Navasota. Funeral Service will be held at the family residence at 610 Malcolm Street in Navasota on Monday
column3: June 22nd at 10:00am with interment following at Oakland Cemetery. Rev. Rodolfo ""JoJo"" Cal-Ortiz will officiate.
